unit_specific.description: In your Shooting phase, each time a model in this unit makes a attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

composition_and_wargear.default_wargear_text: Every model is equipped with: a bile spurt, a missile launcher, a multi-melta, and a gnashing maw.

leader: This unit cannot be led by any Character and cannot lead other units.
